text: Horizon () is a 2018 Georgian drama film directed by Tinatin Kajrishvili. It was screened in the Panorama section at the 68th Berlin International Film Festival. ==Cast== * Giorgi Bochorishvili as Giorgi * Ia Sukhitashvili as Ana * Jano Izoria as Jano * Ioseb Gogichaishvili as Valiko * Lili Okroshidze as Marika ==References== ==External links== * Category:2018 films Category:2018 drama films Category:Films from Georgia (country) Category:Georgian-language films Category:Drama films from Georgia (country)
title: Horizon (2018 film)
